SELECT payment.PAYMENTPRICE, payment.PAYMENTCODE, member.MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS AS paymentStatus FROM payment INNER JOIN member ON payment.MEMBERID=member.MEMBERID WHERE RENTALCODE=(SELECT RENTALCODE FROM rental WHERE BOOKCODE=#{bookCode} AND RETURNSTATUS="N" )

SELECT books.BOOKNAME, books.WRITER, books.PUBLISHER, books.CATEGORY, books.GENRE, books.BOOKLOCATION, rental.RENTALSTARTDAY, rental.RETURNEXPECTDAY FROM books INNER JOIN rental ON books.BOOKCODE=rental.BOOKCODE WHERE rental.RETURNSTATUS="N" AND books.BOOKCODE=#{bookCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental( BOOKCODE, MEMBERID, RENTALSTARTDAY, RETURNEXPECTDAY, RETURNDAY, RETURNSTATUS )VALUES( #{bookCode}, #{memberId}, #{rentalStartDay}, #{returnExpectDay}, "1999-01-01", #{returnStatus} )
INSERT INTO payment( RENTALCODE, MEMBERID, PAYMENTDAY, PAYMENTPRICE, PAYMENTSTATUS )VALUES( #{rentalCode}, #{memberId}, CURDATE(), #{paymentPrice}, #{paymentStatus} )
